Stephanie Frost is a fourth-year graduate student at the University of South Florida studying Chemistry Education Research under the direction of Jeff Raker. 

To keep up with my publications, please follow me on [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=chh6s00AAAAJ&hl=fr)!
